column4: I have used Windows forever and Linux just for hosting test/development servers. I would like to use Ubuntu Linux for my desktop enviroment as well as for development. My problem is that on Windows I use Windows Media Player 10. I really like it because it has a nice, graphical interface that lets me sort by song title, artist, lets me rate songs, has auto play-lists (e.g. "songs never listened to", "songs commonly listened to at
night", "songs rated 4 or 5 stars", etc). Is there anything comprable in Linux?
